about.title: About
about.subtitle: We are bridging the gap between global talent and opportunities in China. Our mission is to create a seamless ecosystem for education, jobs, and cultural exchange.
about.storyP1: Founded with a vision to connect cultures, AnYiculture started as a small community and has grown into a comprehensive platform serving thousands of expats and local businesses.
about.storyP2: We believe in the power of connection and the potential of every individual to make a mark in the global landscape.

contact.title: Get in
contact.subtitle: Have questions about visas, jobs, or life in China? We re here to help. Reach out to us and we ll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for reaching out. We will get back to you shortly.

careers.title: Join Our
careers.subtitle: We re always looking for passionate individuals to help us build the future of cultural exchange.
careers.appDescription: Tell us why you're a great fit...
careers.appSuccessMessage: We will review your application and get back to you shortly.
careers.resumePlaceholder: Upload your resume or paste a link

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is critically important to us. Transparent, secure, and user-centric data practices are at the core of AnYiculture.
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and professional details.
privacy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, facilitate connections between users, and communicate with you about updates, security alerts, and support messages.
privacy.section3Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section4Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can manage your account settings directly within the application or contact our support team for assistance.

terms.title: Terms of
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform. By accessing AnYiculture, you agree to be bound by these conditions.
terms.section1Content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using these particular services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services.
terms.section2Content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.
terms.list2: Update your information to keep it current
terms.list3: Do not use the service for any illegal purpose
terms.section3Content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at

blog.title: Latest
blog.demoDesc: A comprehensive guide to helping you navigate the latest changes in Chinese visa policies for expats and workers.

landing.title: VISA SERVICES
landing.subtitle: Professional guidance for your journey to China. We simplify the complex visa application process.
landing.ctaDescription: Begin your visa application process today with our guided system.
landing.signInMessage: Please sign in or create an account to start your visa application.

timing.title: Processing Time
timing.description: Standard processing takes 4 business days. Express service available.

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.description: Prepare your passport, photos, and supporting documents based on visa type.

assistance.title: Expert Assistance
assistance.description: Our team provides 24/7 support throughout your application process.

application.documentRequirements: Ensure documents are clear and legible. PDF or Image formats allowed.

step1.description: Choose the visa type that best matches your purpose of visit.
step1.title: Select Visa Type

step2.description: Enter your personal details as they appear on your passport.

business_m.description: For those who intend to go to China for commercial and trade activities.
business_m.title: M Visa (Business)

crew_c.description: For crew members on international aviation, navigation, and land transportation missions.
crew_c.title: C Visa (Crew)

family_q.description: For family members of Chinese citizens or permanent residents.
family_q.title: Q Visa (Family Reunion)

family_s.description: For family members of foreigners working or studying in China.
family_s.title: S Visa (Private Affairs)

student_x.description: For those who intend to study in China for more than 6 months.
student_x.title: X Visa (Student)

talent_r.description: For high-level talents or those with special skills needed in China.
talent_r.title: R Visa (Talent)

tourist_l.description: For those who intend to go to China as a tourist.
tourist_l.title: L Visa (Tourist)

work_z.description: For those who have obtained an employment permit and intend to work in China.
work_z.title: Z Visa (Work)
